title: Need Rioter for 1000th win
body: Just reached my 999th win and would like to play with a Rioter to reach 1000 :)

replies.body:
Hi hi! 

When are you free to play?
I'm free to play any time today or tomorrow :P

Wait this is a real thing!?! Omg this is the kinda player/developer relationship I am talking about. Rito has just earned Mastery Level 10: Respect & Love!!! Now I have something to push me through the next 557 wins. 

Thanks <3
If this hasn't happened already, then there needs to be footage. FOR riots PR, and because it will be awesome. please someone capture it,

Alpha is my friend, this happened :^)

Proof: http://snag.gy/ZX9fU.jpg
1000th with 1 char so 1m mastery point they will play with you? <3
